channel.title: Writings on My Obsidian Site
channel.description: Recent content in Writings on My Obsidian Site

item.description:
sure, you say you begin listening, not seriously and kinda curiously because you know what your hearing is going to change because its a joke

the punch line comes but the punch line was not the joke it was the perceived reality prior to the punch line that is the joke

the world is a joke and everything you experience is has the potential to reveal
an ironic outcome if you don’t hold it seriously and listen curiously

the conflict is not with the identity it is the way we form our identity. How we can form it together around a main idea. We must central our forces around a main idea within the identity of ourself. There are o many conflicts within conflicts. One side beleives in beleiving in something else outside of itself, the right side wants a leader, it wats someone to tell them what to do.the left side wants themslefs, they want to spread. they cannot unite in the same way as the right. It is not just a conflict between 2 groups of people it is the conflict behnd what we are fighting for. While the left takes up its own path of self identiy, and then forms its belief system around, its journey, passion, hearts path, to choose a cause that benifits the whole. The left will fight for the future. While the right is fighting to maintain, to stay the same, to protect their identity, which is tied into the pattern they have always known. There is no searching for expansion of knowledge, of insight, their is a guard up. They want the land, they want the known, they dont want chaos.

but where are the facts what is the evidence that can prove this. fact comes from science, science cannot fathom the existence of both fact and perception

we are both getting to know our world, and getting to know what it means truth is both fact and perception

both are based on each other, never separate co existing in a dance to get us to grasp and sense into our world
we lost the ability to have fun when did you forget to play, when did you become ashamed, and when did the ability to dream fade away,

he said you notice the patterns, and then you identify with it, that is not how smart works i thought thats how i’ve learnt to love, from the insides out, this is spirituality, in a world of facts, I don’t care how you see it, the shift is not from the outside in, you must learn youre youre own, person, own experience, made to unfold,

i see him doing math, amI jealous I didn’t train my brain that way, or am i grateful i cant work with numbers the same, i said dror, I love your brain, but i really wanna know, does it make you insane. is playing sane, a part of the pain, or do you really like thinking that way, because I lost need, the ability to see, how the world adds up logically, I left it behind, and I cant look back, because something about being an artist is so much more interesting. am i sorry for the way i feel, dont let me steal the dignity , youve collected from thiscollectve frequency, is it to real for you, the me i cant not be, or can you prentend, and pay this game with me, I dont want to make sense, I dont want the proff for I built this house without a roof

remember its power when we were young and could get wrapped up for hours in our invented mind,

and somewhere along the lines we had to give over this power to what was real, what was proof, what was good, what was cool

we lost the ability to invent this place into our home

creativity is not an art practise it is not something we make time for it is never separate from any moment its always happening with each moment we make more and more sense of our world we are imagining into our reality

i always had a feeling I would have to get over what people thought of me, and I wondered how I would ever get there. I got so good at being great for others, how could I let this image free. Israel is spitting truth in my face in the most beautiful tragic and mesmoring ways, i am forgetting whats its like to care what other think of me. My old life in Canada feels like a dream I cant remember how it felt to be there. Only the images reply in my mind about the person I tried so hard to be. I never felt at home in Canada, I felt like an alien. Someone way far removed from its context. Here in Israel I feel I have met my people again. These people are faced with the deep complex truth of reality, each one of them has to deal with the dark shadows of life in there own way. No one can pretend here. I came from pretend land, where the only problems we must face are domestic. I came from a safe space, I came from protection.

we don’t get to know things before they happen, because it is the process of knowing them where we come alive. It is the decisions and options that present themselves, that reveal the known direction. So when we land at the known, we can trust that it was the unknown that got us there.

This is the relationship we build, and the unknown direction becomes more known. As long as we can always know that we will know where to go, then we can exsist with peace here on earth, in the unknown.

experience is always crossing a threshold beyond what exists as it creates in one way, it simultaneously creates for another in another side of consciousness

we talk about all these states of conciseness, like we move in and out of them, but we don’t move into an unconscious state, the unconscious state is always happening at the same time as the conscious one we cant shut any layer off, multiple states are always happening at once, and each one is has its own unique relationship to each other

we are a part of a game. “god creation or whatever has invented for us a place and time and space for the whole to come home to. It was created invented a system that would play out all sides of experience,to bring the experience closer to soul. Each individual was a part of the whole coming home, and each one was responsible for addressing sides of the pattern, so that the whole dish can be cooked, and eventually distilled back to its core.It was the journey, the process of this alchemy , we are meant to come and experience. In each life time, following a strand of continuously, constantly weaving and forming like a dna strand. We must respect each-other for their part in the pattern.We must remember for ourself, to remember for those around.We have the opportunity to create tremendous waves through out ability to follow the natural path of creation.To understand what is compromising the system as a part of understanding of self.

science validates our experience with the proof from the external reality by attempting to add it up and make it all make sense but everything on this planet is an internal experience everything we experience is our individual perception.

we can agree upon things, there can be a correct answer but even the answer meant something different to everyone

it’s the last thing we would acknowledge in a connection but the first thing that motivates us to connect

the time and space we came from we pretend that there is the prescription for all of time religion would give every individual the same prescription
for all time and space.

we believe their is a sort of formula for doing human and we check with the external reality on how to behave

we celebrate and acknowledge our differences in appearance, and beliefs,

(religion) the idea that where we came from and our age does not determine our differences but and instead makes up a portion of our differences, and rather physical appearance gets more credit as a differences than age
